long_description: Ideal for climbing and mountaineering, the Arc'teryx Alpha SV jacket features rugged GORE-TEX(R) Pro fabric that is extremely waterproof and abrasion resistant for extreme mountain conditions. Made with N80p-X GORE-TEX Pro fabric, the classic Alpha SV is the most durable shell in the Arc'teryx lineup. E3D patterning creates an ergonomic fit for ease of movement; expedition fit leaves room for maximum winter layering. Helmet-compatible Storm Hood(TM) with a laminated brim rotates without blocking vision. WaterTight(TM) pit zippers allow easy and rapid ventilation. Hood drawcords and pit zippers all adjust with one hand; corded zipper pulls reduce noise and are easy to grab. Two bellowed pockets remain accessible while wearing a pack; jacket also includes 1 sleeve pocket and 1 internal pocket. Arc'teryx Alpha SV jacket has a hem drawcord and HemLock(TM) removable inserts that prevent jacket from slipping out from underneath a harness.
short_description: Ideal for climbing and mountaineering, the Arc'teryx Alpha SV jacket features rugged GORE-TEX(R) Pro fabric that is extremely waterproof and abrasion resistant for extreme mountain conditions.
